players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is dead. We need to discuss who we suspect and why. No one is above suspicion."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "Bob, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. Real detectives usually gather more info before revealing."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're really the detective, why reveal yourself so early? That makes you an easy target. This feels like a desperate mafia play."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie first instead of someone more suspicious? That seems like an odd choice for a real detective."
Bob: "I am the detective. I investigated Charlie, he is mafia. Alice, I chose him randomly. We must vote him out now."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
